author: JamonHam

comments.content: Several years ago, it was very trendy to use this font that was never meant to be used as a stand-alone font. I still really like it.

Hi Mike, Rosewood is near the top of my recommendations for well constructed ornate fonts. Everything is top notch, including the design of the letterforms for the basic fill -- an excellent balancing of restrained & sensuous , as is confirmed by the design's popularity as a standalone display font.  
Don
